backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and student signup storage with access‑controlled queries and mutations for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented app features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten short summaries for all frontend React source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variables file defining the app’s OKLCH color palette and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, authentication guards, layout, theming, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component showing copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, logo, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper rendering the header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied card with a message and link to home when user lacks permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Renders login/logout controls, showing sign-in button or account dropdown based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks caller role and shows loading, access denied, or its children based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures user authentication via Internet Identity, showing loading or sign-in UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/StudentSignupFor: Signup form component using react-hook-form to submit student signup data via useCreateSignup with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSignups.ts: Hooks for admins to fetch all student signups or a specific signup by ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and authentication helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentSignups.ts: Hooks to create a new signup and fetch the current user's signups via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile and retrieve their role using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border, background, and text styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
Displays all student registrations in a table with loading and error handling, linking to individual record details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSignupDeta: Shows detailed information for a single student signup with navigation back to the admin panel and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons for signup and admin access.
frontend/src/pages/StudentProfilePage.ts: Fetches and displays the logged-in student's registration records with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StudentSignupPage.tsx: Shows a student registration form and navigates to the profile page upon successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, plugins, and container settings for the app’s theme.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, requirements, and metadata for the Shikshy mantra app build.
